website_summaries.verdict: Anyone looking for an easily customizable memory loss clock will find their match in this product.
pros: Option to program to five international languages
Easy access buttons display essential information with a simple press
Is able to be used as a digital photo frame
cons: Displays "night" until 6 a.m., which can be confusing for some users

customer_reviews.title: Can't reset time!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Sept 2017, initial setup easy, worked great until I tried to set for eastern time. Tried everything, all the clock would do was show a picture with INNOCLOCK logo. Unplugged, same picture, could not get menu to show. Going to purchase atomic clock so I don't have to worry about setting clock twice a year. Clock was/is for my mother who has dementia.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: The clock was easy to set up but quit after three months
customer_reviews.text: What a drag. The clock was easy to set up but quit after three months. TWO MESSAGES TO THE COMPANY HAVE BEEN IGNORED. I think it should have some kind of warranty. This expensive clock is made is China, very cheaply. BUYER BEWARE! The company has no after-sales customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Fields

customer_reviews.title: "NIGHT" display lasts til 6:00 a.m.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, and almost did. Here is my issue: In the morning, the display says it is "night" until 6:00 a.m. when is switches to "morning". This is highly confusing to my already-confused mother. This issue thoroughly defeats the purpose for which we purchased the clock in the first place. I have an email in to the seller about whether the time can be adjusted. If it cannot be, I will be returning it. I need a clock that is helpful, not confusing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cowdrey

customer_reviews.title: This clock works great, is very easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a relative who is in the early stages of dementia and often forgets what day or time of day it is. He has taken his medications at the wrong time because he got confused. This clock works great, is very easy to read, and has solved the problem. My only complaint is that it doesn't automatically adjust for Standard or Daylight Saving Time, but that minor detail was not sufficient to diminish my 5-star rating. And it is very easy to set.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: It’s a piece of crap don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 6 months then quit!! The only way to turn it on and off is to unplug it. When you do it just says “INNOCLOCK” then blinks the same message!! It’s a piece of crap don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Cook

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but "no daylight savings mode"-really??
customer_reviews.text: My elderly parent loved it so much he asked for another in his bedroom. I think it helps him be grounded in time. (in a good way) He says it is too bright in hos bedroom though even with the maximum night mode dimming set to 4. We're considering covering it with some mesh to dim in manually. I do think it is ridiculous that the designers didn't have the forethought to give it an automatic daylight savings mode considering the time confusion this will inevitably cause till some one who lives nearby can reset in twice a year! Does what is intended though so I give it 4 stars unless it fails in some way.
customer_reviews.author: JWhite

customer_reviews.title: Nice Clock !
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one of these clocks earlier this year and unfortunately had a major issue with it straight out of the box. Seems it worked only part of the time and had display issues as well .... BUT almost immediately after sending word back to Timeless Innovations (seller) and making the issue known thru an Amazon message board, Nick C. at Timeless Innovations got right too work and had a replacement sent to me amazingly fast. The new one worked perfectly and still does. We both knew it was just a fluke and an unfortunate problem but was very happy that with simply asking for help the people at Timeless corrected the problem with no hassle! - NICE!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: This clock stopped working 15 months after I purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock for a dear friend who is in a nursing home. The clock stopped working 15 months after I purchased it. The instruction sheet has the words, "contact us", and it has a telephone number which does not work. It also has an email address which is a lie, and last but not least, a web site which doe not exist. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Louis G. Gregorio

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: We really loved this clock. However, it gained time quickly. When we decided to make the time correct again, and pushed the menu button, it reverted to a picture of the innoclock logo and never worked again. It was completely unresponsive. I unplugged it several times for different times and nothing changed. After being unable to find support or a manual online, I went back to Amazon and read many reviews that highlighted the exact same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Motown Jane

customer_reviews.title: I hate it when a product shows it's poor quality AFTER ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive clock. I used it daily in my 3rd grade classroom, and suddenly, it STOPPED working. Nothing more than the start screen.... What do I do now?.... I'm not able to return it...I hate it when a product shows it's poor quality AFTER the return period! So unfair!.... I'm a teacher and can't afford to buy another. Terribly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Teach

customer_reviews.title: Resetting for Day Light Savings locked my clock
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these units from Amazon for my mother with Alzheimer’s and this morning I went to reset the clock for DLS and it locked up. She relies on your clock and I need your help to fix the clock. I now own two as I bought a second one this year for my fathers room as well. Please help me as I see there was a problem with an older version. That may include my mother’s device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal product for caregivers and their loved ones.  WE LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: My 92 year old father in law has mentioned on several occasions that he loves his new Innoclock. It is easy for him to see from across the room while he relaxes in his recliner. Most importantly, it has really helped him keep track of the day and date, which recently has caused him some difficulty with keeping his medical appointments straight. The Innoclock is a wonderful product, and I highly recommend it to anyone who struggles with mild dementia or for those who care for them.
customer_reviews.author: kaktak

customer_reviews.title: I got it as a birthday present from her 5 Great Grandchildren and it was the best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Innoclock for my 87 year old mom who has hearing and sight loss . I got it as a birthday present from her 5 Great Grandchildren and it was the best gift ever ! She no longer has to ask everyone what day,date and time it is anymore . She just looks on her side table and there it is bright and clear , this can also be used as a photo frame . This clock has been a great addition to her bedroom ,has given her the independence of knowing what time etc.it is on her own . I would recommend this clock for anyone but especially those with sight issues.
customer_reviews.author: CORRINE CRONIN

customer_reviews.title: Junk programing
customer_reviews.text: Great idea...poor execution. The clock worked very well but as others report, it fails. Mine like others, quit when daylight savings time must have hit a programmer error. That is when the product fails. Can't locate the company. Will try to work with Amazon to get a new one or my money back. If that fails, I will go back to my credit card company and have them fight the fight. Very irritating!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Died, mfr no help
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock in August of 2018. Worked well until about a week ago. Then it would only display the opening screen cycling to a black screen. Could not get a response from any control. Could not turn it off except by unplugging it. At the price of this clock, it should last for years. I tried to contact the manufacturer by the means given in the manual. Telephone number gets a strange busy type signal. E-mails get returned and the web site doesn't exist. I could not find a way to contact the manufacturer on the Amazon website.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Voila!  A 21st Century Clock
customer_reviews.text: The Innoclock I purchased on Amazon.com exceeded my expectations. If was a gift for my mother for her birthday last week. She liked it, and can easily read it—terrific. The really impressive thing was that when we plugged it in to hang it on the wall we did not need to set it. Voila! The clock displayed the correct time, date, day, and time of day without any human intervention. Clocks have finally joined us in the twenty-first century. I’m impressed, very impressed. Oh, and my mother is very happy with the clock too.
customer_reviews.author: Saladboy

customer_reviews.title: Clock does not work
customer_reviews.text: The clock just stopped working. Menu button does not display anything. The screen is rather black or just display Innoclock logo. The website on the back timelessinnovation.com does not exist. Google search for user manual, contact information or troubleshooting retrieve Amazon reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: dead - not able to resuscitate ...
customer_reviews.text: how insanely frustrating - the website on the printed sticker on the back of the unit is not a working website ... all the usual tricks one can try (press and hold this button, press and hold two buttons to reboot or reset) - nothing works - and what the heck is the USB port good for? I'm not going to plug this defective unit into my expensive laptop with the possibility of malware being downloaded ... no contact info for manufacturer, no help at all - but, it was a very useful clock when it worked ... my review seems similar to others - and since I'm well beyond the Amazon return window, I'm toast and out $43 (argh)
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Service replacement
customer_reviews.text: You replaced this item for me in the past, because it stopped working Unfortunately, the new one is doing the same thing as the first one did. This morning the date was missing, and part of the year. I unplugged it, and plugged it back in, and there is only the INNOCLOCK screen, and nothing happens when I press the MENU key. I cannot turn it off by pressing the ON/OFF button. I have to unplug it. I do not know how to contact you. HELP! PLEASE! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi@amazon

customer_reviews.title: Blank Screen
customer_reviews.text: This product was great, my parents loved being able to easily read the time, day and date. However, the clock stopped working less than a year after purchase. The screen just went blank. There also is no website to be found for Timeless Innovation to call or email questions. I did find one site with questions about the clock, a Nick C., GoodDesigns/Timeless addressed the issue of the clock not working stating there was a batch with a software error. I email Nick C. using the email address in the post. The email was returned undeliverable. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine W.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for the elderly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Father's Day. Best gift ever! The large print is easy for him to read. He checks the clock several times a day to remember the date & month. It is also very helpful after he takes a nap and gets confused about it being morning or night. I highly recommend this clock.
customer_reviews.author: KJChard

customer_reviews.title: Love it! My Mom does not call me all ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! My Mom does not call me all hours of the night now .Helps her with her Dementia...
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mekkelsen

customer_reviews.title: This clock has not lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this clock it was great. Then it started gaining time. I would reset it and in a few days it would be running almost 10 minutes fast again. I have not had this clock a year yet and I noticed the year was 2048. When I went to reset the year the clock went off. I unplugged it then plugged it back in and now it is stuck on the start up picture. I have contacted the company with whom I have purchased it and have not heard from them. This clock was $50 and I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock! I work asa third shift nurse, and sleeping during the day I get all mixed upon my time and date. This clock is a Godsend for me.
customer_reviews.author: donna S. WattsI grew up in this town and heard stories about what had happened. SO SAD

customer_reviews.title: Great clock and amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock for a family member who has recently had some memory impairment. It has been such a help to her and eases her frustration. It is simple to use and the display is easy to read. This clock is an amazing clock and not just for the elderly or memory impaired! In addition to giving five stars for the clock, I am equally impressed with the customer service I received from Good Designs. I had a question about the function of the clock and within a few minutes, they answered my question and sent me a new user guide!
customer_reviews.author: Kara A

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock!!!
customer_reviews.text: My father was diagnosed with mild to moderate dementia about three years ago now and I have been really worried about his condition. He has great difficulty trying to remember what year date and day it is and now with this new innoclock it made a hugh difference. I ask him every day after I get home from work what day and date it is and he responds right away as long as innoclock is close to him were he can see and read it. He seems to be more happy now. Thank you so much for such a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.  Sets itself.  Good decor.
customer_reviews.text: It looks very decorative and everyone who sees it thinks it is wonderful. They are right. My Mom is in a nursing/rehab facility and her roommate has some dementia that causes her to worry about what the date is. This clock face shows everything and even sets itself. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to an elderly person's home
customer_reviews.text: I thought the clock was wonderful. My mother is still mobile, so I placed it so she could see it easily most of the day. She must have dropped it, as the front glass is already broken. However, it still works great and the crack hardly shows. My suggestion would be that the "glass" be made of something unbreakable. It was easy to set and I already had to change the time when daylight savings time changed. I highly recommend this clock. My mother is 101 and loves the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Jeddob

customer_reviews.title: Style okay,  but quit working
customer_reviews.text: Like: This style clock is perfect for people with dementia. Dislike: The clock gradually lost time. This model quit working and I've had it less than a year. Now it just blinks between the logo and a black screen. I'm going to try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: assist me on a return/repair for my product
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Thank you Innoclock for replacing my clock!!! We love the clock and it's features. I agree with Terri K Goebel completely. I am having the exact same issue with my clock which was purchased in October. I hope you will be able to assist me on a return/repair for my product as well. I originally loved the clock, However, it began gaining time and now will only display "INNOCLOCK" no matter what I do. I have unplugged it and turned it off and on. No menu buttons or settings will work. Thank you, I look forward to your response.
customer_reviews.author: J  Appel

customer_reviews.title: Is company still in business?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock in 2017. After working fine for a number of months, it kept looping the Innoclock picture. After contacting Timeless Innovation several times, I was told to return it and they would send another. The replacement worked fine for a number of months, then it also began to loop. Email to the company came back undeliverable, the website is not active and the phone number just kept ringing. I’m not sure if the company is still in business and I have a non working clock.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Reinholdt

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PURCHASE- OUT OF BUSINESS!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product. It really helped with problems due to dementia. It worked well for 6 months. We started to have problems with certain portions of the screen wigging out. Then it just quite all together. It trying to get an exchange, we found no way of getting a hold of them. And, when trying to go directly through Amazon, we found no resolution. Damn!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R Cox

customer_reviews.title: My father has early dementia and is sometimes confused as ...
customer_reviews.text: My father has early dementia and is sometimes confused as to whether it's morning or evening. He's gotten up at 4:30am many times and dressed for dinner. This clock has been a blessing. It reminds him of day, date, and time of day. It helps save his dignity and my sanity. The big bright numbers and letters mean he can see it from anywhere in his room day or night.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed that they both immediately showed the current day/date/time and ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered and received two INNOCLOCKs and they are both installed in strategic locations to help my wife. I was amazed that they both immediately showed the current day/date/time and one of them was only about 4 minutes off. That was helpful, as it forced me to consult the paperwork to see what I needed to do to change the minutes to the correct time. Since then they have kept up with my Mondaine Swiss Rail Road clock. Good product and easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Baer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is very helpful and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock for my mom who has major memory problems and it is very helpful for her to figure out the day and date each day. However, after a few months it blacked out. We had a storm the night before, so we don't know what or why it quit working. I called the customer service center and explained the problem. They promptly sent me another clock and all is well again. They were very easy to deal with and happy to make it right for us. I would buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly who are trying to maintain their independence if it would last
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for from August 2018 until May of 2019, but now the logo stays on and cannot get the menu to display. Sent an email to the manufacturer who said the would help, just send them the order number. I sent the order number and did not hear back from them. I sent it again and did not hear back from them. Terrible customer service, which is a shame because it's a great product if only they would stand by their product and help trouble shoot.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: My aunt is slowly losing her memory and has a great deal of trouble remembering days
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough positive things about this clock. My aunt is slowly losing her memory and has a great deal of trouble remembering days. This has been a lifesaver it is exactly as advertised plus read about it so that you see all the extras that are included. A fantastic idea a terrific product I'm so happy I found it thank goodness for Amazon! And for this - I just took a chance of finding something like this on Amazon and Bam! there it was.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great clock with variable dimness
customer_reviews.text: Great clock with variable dimness. Wish it ran on batteries. The month at the bottom of the screen is left justified, and the day and year are right justified. They should be centered together. No more, "Honey, what time is it?" in our dark family room after a movie ends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Innoclock quit working after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my inlaws...they loved the clock! I set it up for them with no problems, but after 10 months the clock has stopped working. I unplugged it to try to reset and now I can't get it off of the first frame. Wish I could find a product like this that would last a little longer or at least find info on how to correct the issue. After reading reviews, it seems as though other's have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rcbuck

customer_reviews.title: Love this clock!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clock! Bought it for my grandfather who has Alzheimer's so he can see the time and day well. With his disease he was constantly confusing AM and PM time and other clocks did not display these letters big enough. It is easy to set (barely any set up at all) and can be seen clearly from any angle. Lightweight and easy to manage. I set mine to Spanish and it is accurate. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diverís

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING FOR NO REASON
customer_reviews.text: We loved it at first. Even bought 3 more for gifts. Sadly this wood grain one just stopped working. The logo would show up, blink for a few times then went completely black. I have only had it 7 months! I have no idea how to get it returned. Please help!
customer_reviews.author: W. S. Quong

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock for my husband, who has Vascular Dementia, while he is in a Rehab facility after having some brain surgery. It's great for him to be able to orient himself to the date, day, time, and year several times a day, as he cannot remember these things. Other than the clock picking up a few minutes and running fast every once in a while, it's a great product. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: What an inferior piece of expensive junk!!! I bought this for my wife in Nov 2017 and it only worked for 6 months. Contacted manufacturer and they sent a new one only I had to pay shipment to send the broken one back. That was last summer... fast toward to now and the replacement clock doesn't work and now I'm out of warranty! I feel that I might as well have lit a match to $100!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clock
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent clock. This display is large and very clear. Very easy to set up. When I bought the clock, I didn't realize that it has four medication reminder alarms (morning, afternoon, evening, bedtime) that can be turned on as needed and set to whatever time you want. When the alarm sounds the screen shows a specific message (e.g. "morning medication") that has really helped my mother take her meds consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Rick A

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY annoying alarm, returned for refund
customer_reviews.text: Fine clock. BUT: all require taking clock down & pushing a back button to silence the EXTREMELY annoying alarm. Will NOT be welcomed by senior relatives needing help with waking up, medicine time reminders, etc. Grandma will probably stomp it, or drop it in a sink of water; very politely, of course.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for seniors, easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read, shows everything you need to know. Especially good for retirees if you don't have a work schedule, lose track of what day it is.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clock.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clock. Easy to see, easy to set up, easy to adjust. Nice bright numbers and letters, but easy on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product!  It Stops working in less than a year.  No technical support
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews, along with my clock stopping, this seems to be a common problem. The clock stops working in less than one year. There is no technical support. This is a terrible product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corrine

customer_reviews.title: Worked great  until I had to reset the time now the screen is just black
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact the first time I had to change anything on the screen that it will not bring up the menu, or respond to any other controls on the back. Looks like you only get to set it up once.
customer_reviews.author: Irving George Pennini

customer_reviews.title: one Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, but it quit working after 9 months. I plan to return it and order a new one. This was a perfect clock for me, and I ordered another for a gift. It too only lasted a few months. It's going back. There are so many look-alike brands. Hopefully I can find one that will last. I have now returned my 3rd one of these. What a let down. I really felt this was a great clock for me at my age.
customer_reviews.author: Rager849

customer_reviews.title: CRAP PILE DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Mom who has dementia and it WAS wonderful, but coming up on the one-year anniversary of when I purchased it, the crappy thing will not display the opening menu therefore the Language is stuck on Deutsch and CANNOT BE CHANGED to ANYTHING CLOSE TO English. Read all the reviews and they’re all the same=CHUNK IT, IT’S A PIECE OF JUNK😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: LK teach

customer_reviews.title: but I felt compelled to let everyone know this great! As soon as I plugged it in at ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but I felt compelled to let everyone know this great! As soon as I plugged it in at the rehab center, the staff was buzzing - even the administrator took pictures of it - they are considering purchasing it for all the rooms. The most important was the response I received from my friend. She couldn't stop smiling. Looks just like the picture - one of the staff thought it was a black board.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Great clock if it worked. All my friends wanted one — unfortunately it quit working after six months. I should have listened to the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working like many others have said. Worked 8 months and now just shows logo. Very expensive item should last years. Do not buy this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Easy Clock/Calendar especially for the aging.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock for my aging mother who is suffering with the early stages of dementia. She was getting terribly confused with days and times of the day. It is a fantastic tool, very easy to read and is classy, not tacky. I do not believe it will work for her forever as she declines but it is very helpful for her now and it gives her just one tiny bit of control over her condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this clock
customer_reviews.text: This clocked was awesome for a short time. My mother came to rely on it, but after a few months, it suddenly quit working. The screen became scrambled, and then assumed the home screen that says "Innoclock" and was never to work again. I emailed both the seller (Good Designs--no response), and the manufacturer (Timeless--email returned as undeliverable).
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: This product fails after 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to change the time to update for DST and the clock has fallen into a non-operating mode. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. L Madison

customer_reviews.title: So far all is good hoping it continues
customer_reviews.text: So far all is good hoping it continues. Liking the large bright date time etc.. Mom can see it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen McGilp

customer_reviews.title: This easy-to-read clock has helped my 90 yr. old ...
customer_reviews.text: This easy-to-read clock has helped my 90 yr. old mom keep oriented to the day & time. The medicine alarm reminder is pleasant, loud, and turns off in one minute. No need for my mom to push any buttons or knobs. The wood style is warmer and easier for her to see on a white counter but we have another one which stands out on a piece of wood furniture. We are covered in both rooms!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy A Young

customer_reviews.title: One yare warranty means nothing.
customer_reviews.text: This product was great when it worked. It stopped working one month prior to manufacturers one year warranty. I tried to contact manufacturer - Timeless - by using phone number printed in product manual. NO ANSWER. Can't find another contact number on-line. My mother relied on this clock so I will order again completely aware it may only work for less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymos

customer_reviews.title: clock failed went absolutely dead
customer_reviews.text: after use for some time clock went dead approx 1 yr lost month then lost everything i have several of this type in house this is the only one to fail
customer_reviews.author: billy o

customer_reviews.title: Only lasts 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my handicapped mother. About 1 year later, the screen went out and you can no longer read any of the data. It's all blotchy pixels. Can't find a way to contact seller to get a replacement. This should last much longer than 12 months! very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shari L Lutey

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 91 year old father. Given his age I thought the clock would outlast him. He's still going strong... the clock... not so much. Given his declining eyesight and his increasing confusion, it was really useful while it worked. Hopefully there is some sort of warranty on it. I would gladly return it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!! Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Clock was originally clear, bright and easy to setup. Unfortunately, within a few months, both clocks (purchased 2) quit working. They both only display Innoclock screen, and cannot be turned off or on. Screen image is frozen, will not show settings or clock. Support does not exist. No return phone call. Website and support email address listed in brochure do not exist. The phone just rings and rings. Would advise against anyone purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really a Great Clock
customer_reviews.text: Gave this clock to our Mother, who has dementia,and is in a rest home for the elderly. I don't know if she appreciates it or knows that it is there, but it is great for me when I visit !!!!
customer_reviews.author: richard d gaither

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my autistic adult son’s room. Love it! Each morning I ask him what is today? What time is it? He just looks at the clock and tells me. Love the big print. Wish I had seen this earlier because it would have been useful for my mother. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!  Company no longer exists!
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION! Do not purchase the INNOCLOCK. The company name, TIMELESS, and their website, TIMELESSINNOVATIONS.COM, no longer exist. My clock stopped working after approximately 8 months, and there is no support or contact information available to follow through with any sort of warranty. Many other people are reporting the exact same results. DO YOUR RESEARCH.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra J.

customer_reviews.title: Happy we purchased this cool clock!
customer_reviews.text: My Mother is extremely happy with her clock and has told us multiple times the difference it has made in her days. As she's grown into the senior aspects of her life, it's often that she calls me to figure what part of the day it is, so your product has been amazing. If It doubled as a Microwave or a TV remote it'd be a game changer! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Loya

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of JUNK. Did not last. Unplugged to take it downstairs after surgery and brought it back up and it does not work. Nice while I had it but I should not have to buy another. Shame on you Amazon for selling poor quality products. Now I have no clock and I would not buy another one from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my parents. The clock display is very large and easy to read. The initial set up and the change to daylight savings were very simple as well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MrsRoro

customer_reviews.title: Great View and Detail
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 85 year old mother who can't see perfectly and was also getting up at 3am and thinking it was 3pm. Awesome, she loves it also. Can see it from across the room easily. Only 'bad', I would like it to run on batteries, not just plug in. Other than that, definitely do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it worked. It only worked about 6 months. It has a 6 month guarantee but you cants reach the manufacturer. I’ve looked on line and can’t find them but I find that a lot of people have the same problem. Very poor product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: For a $40 clock it should last longer than 13 months! As other reviewers noted, once it "dies" all you get is the display screen with zero response from any and all buttons. Yes, the clock is easy to read. But $40 for one year? Nope. Do Not Purchase.....
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for our 99 year old grandfather but loved it so much we bought one for ourselves
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 99 year old grandfather but loved it so much we bought one for ourselves. It is clear, easy to read, the perfect size to see from across the room. It is important for my grandfather to see if it is "morning" or "evening" because sometimes he is disoriented when he wakes up from a nap.
customer_reviews.author: Bancha

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 9 months!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I loved the clock. It did everything a clock is supposed to do - including allowing me to see it WITHOUT my glasses on. Ok great! I don't love it today. We noticed a slight "blocking" on the bottom which blotted out the date wording on the bottom. Today it just TOTALLY stopped working. I don't recommend. Annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: quit working time change weekend
customer_reviews.text: loved the clock until time change weekend when it quit working; no customer support; too expensive for disposable clock. anyone know how to get in touch with the company to get a refund or a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: AGM

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my 82 year old mother. Then there was a power outage and when power came back on the bottom date was not showing anymore. Shut it off and now it doesn't turn back on. Only worked for 7 months. Tried contacting the manufacturer emails come back undeliverable, website is gone, and phone just rings and rings. Very disappointed. Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Wesch

customer_reviews.title: Good clock
customer_reviews.text: This gives all the info a person with dementia needs in large clear letters. I had no problem setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Died after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: We have really liked this clock for our mother who has dementia, but after 10 months it has stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: Died after 14 months
customer_reviews.text: This clock died on me after 14 months. Tried to switch the time. It stopped working. Only logo blinking. $50 for a year of the work seems expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Clock
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock for my mom who is 88 years old and has glaucoma and dementia. She was always very upset because she couldn't figure out what day it was or date. This clock is amazing. It has all the information as shown in the picture in a very large very clear digital format. She loves it. It was well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Stars
customer_reviews.text: brought three of these last January 9, 2018 and one is dead, will not work. Paid almost $50 for it and it didn't last 8 months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne J.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice clock! It is actually the second clock I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice clock! It is actually the second clock I have purchased for my Mom with dementia. The first clock is still working fine, she just needed a second clock in another room. The only disadvantage is that it doesn't automatically change with daylight savings time/standard time. That would have been very helpful. Otherwise, a great idea that fills a definite need!
customer_reviews.author: Nieciemama

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the Elderly!
customer_reviews.text: My mother is elderly and has macular degeneration. This thing is a GODSEND for helping her stay on track with what day it is, and it's so easy for her to see. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: rwilder0603

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful clock. Bought it for my 78 year old father that is in the nursing home. He loves it, the large print allows him to read it from across the room without his glasses. Also, having the day and date along with morning, afternoon, evening... helps keep him from getting confused. Well wort the cost!
customer_reviews.author: APRIL W

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents as a Christmas gift 12/2017. My father called saying it hasn't been working for the last 3 months; blank screen comes up. Contacted Amazon, item over the one year warranty. Thought this product would last more than 1 year. It's a great concept, but not for the price and only lasting 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Failed after only 4 months use and Manufacturer doesn't answer phone or respond to emails.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this clock for my father who has dementia and it failed after only 4 months use. Tried calling the Manufacturer several times but calls will not go through and got no response to my email regarding the 1 yr warranty etc.. Do not buy this clock!
customer_reviews.author: tdfish

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for almost 8 months then it just quit. It will not reboot and it stays locked on the homescreen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved the product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product, my father loved the product. When (6 months in) it stopped working, I contacted the seller, the company, and amazon. There is no way to download instructions to reset it. If I could get it to work again, I'd love it. The lack of customer service when help is needed? Horribly upsetting for a father with dementia that needs consistency
customer_reviews.author: kotarski

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 92 years old mother five months ago, she really liked it, but the letters stared to turning wigglish two weeks ago, I unplugged it to reboot, it came back for two seconds, then it just won’t show anything anymore... there’s no warranty on it? NOT happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: It is a good reminder of what the time and date is when ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mother. Now she can clearly see the time and date from across her room. It is a good reminder of what the time and date is when she gets confused.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for an 86-year-old woman with age-related dementia
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product for an 86-year-old woman with age-related dementia. It helps her keep track of the time, date, and year.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality/Company Defunct Making warranty useless
customer_reviews.text: Stopped functioning just shy of 1 year warranty. Went to adjust it for daylight savings time and now no buttons functions. The screen blinks on/off and is stuck on the home screen with logo. Tried calling customer service # and visiting website listed on instructions and both are invalid. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Lena Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Received a Defective Clock
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock for my dad in July. Less than two months later the screen became distorted. The numbers and words are distorted and sometimes the screen goes blank. I am so disappointed, it was perfect for my dad's dementia. I'd like to exchange it, as this one is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great clock
customer_reviews.text: Very nice clock. My Mom with short term memory loss absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: DMilla

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is June 2018 for my mother who has dementia. Went to adjust for daylights savings time today and it stopped working. It is just flashing the logo screen. This is after less than one year. Ridiculous. Don't buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia George

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable for any length of time
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my husband who is in a nursing home with memory issues. It worked great for awhile them just stopped. All he gets is a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Good display, easy read
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the Innoclock and am relieved that I found a clock that mentions “evening”- my next door neighbor is elderly and since he lives alone often times leaves his apartment disoriented about the time of day. This gives me relief knowing he now has something to refer to. Big bright display is helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with dementia..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice clock. I purchase for my mother who has dementia. She is able to know what time and day and the time of day- morning, afternoon and evening. Large display makes for easy read, and bright when the lights are turned off.
customer_reviews.author: ThatVintageDude06

customer_reviews.title: Innoclock: This item did not last one year.
customer_reviews.text: It has stopped working and I bought this clock less than a year ago for my mother. I will not buy from this item again, it was a waste of money. I would like a refund but it seems that I can't request a refund since the return policy is only 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: ross21710

product_meta.title: INNOCLOCK - Most Advanced Calendar Day Digital Clock - Large, Clear, Unabbreviated Time and Date - Ideal for Memory Loss, Impaired Vision and Seniors (Black, 8-inch)
product_meta.description: Size:8 inch| Color:BlackThe INNOCLOCK by Timeless is a state-of-the-art clock featuring a large, clear display that can be hung on a wall (using its rear mount hole), or stood on a table, nightstand, shelf or desk (using its pull-out stand). It’s great for the home, office, lab and classroom, and especially for seniors and those who benefit from seeing the time and date spelled out and free from abbreviations. Incredibly easy to set up and use. Includes five built-in languages - English, Spanish, French, German and Italian. Powered by included AC adapter (100-250V) with approx 6’ (1.8m) long cable. Give the gift of confidence and happiness — buy an INNOCLOCK for your loved ones today!
feature_bullets: RESTORES CONFIDENCE - Calendar day and time are clearly spelled out, free from any abbreviations that may be confusing for loved ones suffering from memory loss. This can help to eliminate confusion and increase confidence in daily routines.

ACTUALLY VISIBLE - Forget squinting, moving closer or having to ask the assistance of someone else — with the large, crisp display, and its illuminated white characters in bold type font and on a black background, users can read this clock from across the room and at almost any angle, without any blurring. This is especially helpful for the elderly and visually impaired.

ADVANCED - At the press of a single button, the clock can be set to display only the most essential information (such as 'Now it's Wednesday Morning'), thereby eliminating any potentially confusing elements. The clock also offers other great features such as fully adjustable auto nighttime dimmer, 3 alarms, customisable time and date format, and 5 different international languages.

WONDERFUL GIFT - Loved ones will absolutely love the increased confidence and peace of mind they gain from using this clock, and you can rest assured that the beautiful packaging does not in any way mention memory loss or any of the conditions often associated with it, such as dementia or Alzheimer's.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars589 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 12-month manufacturer's warranty with proof of purchase.
